Articles.Content:
What about led lights? Just adds steady or flashing leds that can be placed anywhere. I would love to be able to select colors and flash mode with single item, but minimum 4 types should exist - bright white steady, flashing white, steady bright red, and flashing red. White could probably be replaced with green, especially if below suggestion is also implemented.

Why? Simple really. Makes it easier to see rest of ship in darkness without big lights on rocket itself.

Also "small lights" that is omnidirectional should also be possible. Much less bright than current lights, quite a bit brighter than led lights above but advantage is that it could be seen from any side besides from attached side.

I hope this will be added, those big lights is annoying lol

There are white and red omnilights in the B9 pack, and flashing lights with customizable colours in the aviation lights pack

KOSMOS has an LED spotlight
Those look nice, but I made suggestion because I am not interested in mods. Thanks though.
I agree, more and varied lights would be cool, but this is a "more parts request" and on the do not suggest list.

The "new parts" entry in the what not to suggest list refers to suggesting adding more parts in general, this is a specific part suggestion so does not fall under that.

I actually like this idea, it would make docking at night easier, and you could set up lights along planes, rovers or bases to make them stand out more.
A single led light with a tweakables menu would be enough.
Yes, I always wanted those. They would make everything look better.

Something similar to the Aviation Lights mod would be cool.

A rotating beacon would be nice to have too:

I've always wanted some flat-ish lights to place on the sides of my vehicles, too. I like the directional lights for landers, but they look...not so good on a space station and tend to be a little too bright.

I'd much prefer lights like the B9 aviation lights and I"d love to see them in the vanilla game. Since B9 does stuff for SQUAD now, maybe it's inevitable

A few more lighting options would definitely be nice.

At minimum, I would like to see two new options:

1) Colored non-illuminative signal light (i.e. LED light, possibly with toggle-able colors)

2) Low power omni-directional illumination
Edited November 9, 2019 by Seelenamt

Batteries is bit overkill but yeah can use it for now. I still want my suggestion to be implemented though.

Nice additions all around. I didn't think of few possible uses too.
